I've been playing the Counter Strike series for a long time, I started in 2012 with Counter Strike Source and Prey, I played every day and then switched to Counter-Strike: Global Offensive in 2016 and unfortunately had to realize that it is completely different from the old bestsellers , the recoil system was completely new and was not taken over from the old parts, but I still had a lot of fun, the rank system is good and also provided a kick when you noticed that you had improved. When Counter-Strike: Global Offensive became playable for free, there was only cheaters, thanks to the new update for the rank system it seems that there will be significantly less cheaters, I hope that this will improve even more. The Counter-Strike series will always be a big part of my childhood. :)
